sentences: Parties agreed to continue applying the draft rules of procedure with the exception of draft rule 42 on voting.
Delegates then adopted the COP agenda ( FCCC/CP/2008/1 and Add.1 ) with the item on second review of the adequacy of Article 4.2 (a) and (b) of the Convention being held in abeyance.
On the election of the bureau, President Nowicki said current members would serve until the new bureau is finalized.
Delegates agreed to admit the proposed organizations as observers ( FCCC/CP/2008/3 ).
President Nowicki will consult informally on voluntary quantitative commitments for Kazakhstan for 2008- 2012.
